name: Bombs Are Important
description:
Grim Reaper always liked to kill people, but he couldn't kill them if he didn't know who to kill. That is why he always had his Book Of Death by his side, in which all the names of his victims were written down. However, this Halloween the book was stolen and Grim lost all of his powers! Help Grim find all the missing pages of the Book of Death!

 

 

This is a short top-down action game consisting of bombs, pumpkins & spooky skeletons shooting out electricity. Remember, bombs are important, and you want to use them wisely!
